disclaimerModalTitle.zh: 免责声明和数据隐私政策

disclaimer.en: This tool may use incorrect or outdated requirements. The author of this tool, and the tool itself, are not responsible for any losses caused by its use. Users who utilize this tool are liable for checking the updated requirements on government websites and assume full responsibility for the photos they create using this tool. By clicking "Agree" and continue, you confirm your agreement with this disclaimer.
disclaimer.zh: 此工具可能使用不正确或过时的要求。该工具的作者以及工具本身不对其使用造成的任何损失负责。使用此工具的用户有责任检查政府网站上的最新要求，并对使用此工具创建的照片承担全部责任。通过点击“同意”并继续，表示您确认您同意此免责声明。

disclaimer2.en: Your photo will be processed locally inside your browser. NO photos will be uploaded to any server. The only data shared are your access activities to this website, which are used for Google website analytics. By clicking 'Agree' and continuing, you confirm your agreement with this policy.
disclaimer2.zh: 您的照片将在本地浏览器内进行处理，*不会*上传到任何服务器。唯一共享的数据是您对本网站的访问活动，用于Google网站分析。点击'同意'并继续，即表示您确认同意此政策。

disclaimer3.en: We collect cookies to analyze our website traffic and performance, and we never collect any personal data. By clicking 'Agree' or continue use the website, you confirm your agreement with this policy.
disclaimer3.zh: 我们收集 cookie 是为了分析我们的网站流量和性能，其中不涉及收集任何个人数据。点击“同意”或继续使用该网站，即表示您确认同意本条款。

backgroundRemovalError.en: Error on calling AI background removal, please refresh then retry.
backgroundRemovalError.zh: AI去背景错误，请刷新并重试。

backgroundRemovalIOS.en: AI Background Removal does NOT support iPhone or iPad, please use Android, macOS or Windows device.
backgroundRemovalIOS.zh: AI去背景不支持iPhone或iPad，请使用安卓，苹果电脑，或者Windows设备。

backgroundRemovalReminder.en: It may take a while for the first time, please be patient...
backgroundRemovalReminder.zh: 第一次使用需要稍加等待，请保持耐心......

aiConfirmText.en: Click "Confirm" to start download AI pre-trained model for background removal. It will take ~80MB and will only need to download once for this session.
aiConfirmText.zh: 点击“确认”以开始下载AI预训练的去背景模型。它将占用约80MB的空间，并且仅需要在本次会话中下载一次。

buyMeACoffeeButton.en: Like it? Buy me a coffee!

buyMeACoffeeWords.en: Anything is appreciated! A thank-you letter would make my day as well, I'm glad I can help!
buyMeACoffeeWords.zh: 任何心意都很感激！哪怕是一封感谢信，能帮到你是我最开心的事情！

jobMessage1.en: Hello everyone, I was recently laid off due to reduction in force. If you are in the U.S. and would like to recommend any Software Engineer-related opportunities, please email me at
jobMessage1.zh: 大家好，我最近因为公司运营问题被裁员。如果您在美国，愿意推荐Software Engineer相关职位的，请发邮件到
